cast.overview: When a shadowy CIA agent uncovers damning agency secrets, he's hunted across the globe by a sociopathic rogue operative who's put a bounty on his head.
cast.title: The Gray Man

details.biography: Dana Aliya Levinson is a New York based actress, writer, musician, and trans advocate whose work has been performed from San Francisco to Paris. They are best known for their work as Toni Rykener in "American Gods", Sadie Lipton in "The Good Fight", Hazel in "Adam", Jess in "The Dress You Have On", and Grace in the world premiere of Georgette Kelly's play, "Ballast".
details.name: Dana Aliya Levinson
details.place_of_birth: Great Neck, Long Island, New York, USA
